common.checkConnection: Check your internet connection and try again

onboarding.page1Body: Never miss a message! Stream sermons in Full HD or download them for offline listening. Whether you're commuting, at the gym, or traveling, take our weekly messages with you wherever you go.
onboarding.page2Body: Access the complete English Standard Version (ESV) Bible powered by YouVersion. Read, search, and explore scripture with an intuitive interface designed for daily devotion and study.
onboarding.page3Body: Get the latest church announcements, upcoming events, and community updates. Connect with our team, submit prayer requests, and stay engaged with everything happening at Thrive Community Church.
onboarding.page4Body: Easily find sermons by topic, speaker, or series. Use powerful search and filtering tools to discover messages that speak to your current season and spiritual journey.
onboarding.page5Body: You're all set! Dive in and experience everything Thrive has to offer. We're excited to have you join our community and grow in faith together.

selection.subtitle: Choose a book order
selection.traditionalDescription:
Browse books in biblical order
Genesis → Malachi → Matthew → Revelation
selection.alphabeticalDescription:
Browse books from A to Z
Acts → Amos → Colossians → Daniel

notes.title: Notes
notes.emptyDescription: Create a note to get started
notes.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this note?

list.deleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this note?
list.emptyDescription: Take notes during a sermon by tapping the "Take Notes" button on any message. Your notes will be saved here, organized by sermon.

detail.emptyNoteMessage: There is no content to share.

sendLogs.title: Send Logs to Support
sendLogs.message: Please describe any issues you're experiencing with the app:
sendLogs.subject: Thrive {{platform}} - ID: {{feedbackId}}
sendLogs.deviceInfoErrorMessage: Unable to retrieve device information. Please try again.
sendLogs.exportErrorMessage: Unable to create log file. Please try again.
sendLogs.noEmailIOS: No email app is configured on this device. Please install and configure the Mail app or another email client to send logs.
sendLogs.noEmailAndroid: No email app is installed on this device. Please install an email app (such as Gmail) to send logs.
sendLogs.genericErrorSimulator: Unable to send logs. Email functionality is not available on simulators. Please test on a physical device.
sendLogs.genericErrorIOS: Unable to send logs. Please make sure the Mail app is configured on your device, or try using another email app.
sendLogs.genericErrorAndroid: Unable to send logs. Please make sure you have an email app installed and configured on your device.
sendLogs.unexpectedErrorMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.

about.title: About Thrive Church App
about.message:
Version: {{version}} (Build {{buildNumber}})

©{{year}} Thrive Community Church

This app helps you stay connected with our church community, access sermons, take notes, and more.

sermonCard.accessibilityHint: Tap to play or view sermon options

bibleReader.apiConfigMessage:
To use Bible passage reading, you need to:

1. Get a free API key from api.esv.org
2. Add it to your app configuration

The ESV API is free for non-commercial use.
